Title.Language: Doxology for the Three Holy Youth

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of the Three Holy Youth:

Text.Language: Pisah n~te ]h~rw: aferhouo~ e~[ici e~masw: n~h~me it m~mahi e~bol: ouoh afrwkh n~ni,aldeoc.
The flames of the furnace / were exceedingly hot / Forty-nine arms high / which burned the Chaldeans.

Pisomt n~a~lou n~a~gioc: Cedrak Micak Abdenagw: auerelpic e~Po#c# e~tafouwrp m~pefLogoc: aferbo/yin e~rwou.
The three holy youth / Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego / depended upon the God / Who sent His Logos and saved them.

What a wonder / the furnace was sending dew / With the three youth inside of it / together with the Angel.

They were walking into / the blazing fire / And emerged from it / glorifying the God of Israel.
